meanings: (물건이) pile up, (가지런히) be stacked (up), (아무렇게나) be heaped (up)

vlive.korean: [쁘띠함도 같이 쌓인다... 이 쁘띠춤사위가 그 근거라고요] 이게 맞나요? [he gets cuter. This dance is the evidence of it] Is that right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [FTISLAND] 말랑말랑시절 엪티 회상 절대 관두지마💪💕 (FTISLAND’s reaction of their past video)
vlive.english: [he gets cuter. This dance is the evidence of it] Is that right?

vlive.korean: 차곡차곡 팬의 마음이 쌓인다. Fan's love stacks up one by one. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : #SHINee's Back #1 of 1
vlive.english: Fan's love stacks up one by one.

vlive.korean: 이건 보이니까 눈에, 짜증이 어떻게 쌓여? As you can see it. But how can irritation get piled up? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 행복전도사🙅‍♂️🙆‍♂️
vlive.english: As you can see it. But how can irritation get piled up?

vlive.korean: [반칙 쌓이면 퇴장인데 강아지라서] 이거 돼요? [When you get too much foul, you're ordered to leave the game, but since you're a puppy] Can he do that? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [3년 전 오늘의 VICTON] 정말 즐거운 💛내 마음을 잡아줘💙야~ (VICTON’s Drawing Quiz 3years ago)
vlive.english: [When you get too much foul, you're ordered to leave the game, but since you're a puppy] Can he do that?

vlive.korean: 형 이게 많이 쌓인 거야? It's accumulated much? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚

examples.korean: Work always piles up at the end of the year. 발음듣기 연말이 되면 언제나 일이 쌓인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Work always piles up at the end of the year. 발음

examples.korean: When you’re feeding a family of six the bills soon add up. 발음듣기 6인 가족을 부양하다 보면 공과금이 금방 쌓인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When you’re feeding a family of six the bills soon add up. 발음

examples.korean: Interest will accrue if you keep your money in a savings account. 발음듣기 돈을 저축예금계좌에 넣어 두면 이자가 쌓인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Interest will accrue if you keep your money in a savings account. 발음

examples.korean: The snow there is often twenty or more feet in depth. 발음듣기 그곳에서는 눈이 흔히 20피트 이상의 깊이로 쌓인다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The snow there is often twenty or more feet in depth. 발음

examples.korean: Snow piles up on the ground. 발음듣기 눈이 땅 위에 쌓인다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Snow piles up on the ground. 발음
